title: Prime Trust Put Into Receivership Amid Shortfall in Funds, Charges It Misused Customer Money
description: Crypto custodian Prime Trust has been ordered by the Eighth Judicial District Court of Nevada, where the company has its headquarters, to be put into receivership after the state ordered the custodian to cease all activities amid a shortfall of customer funds.

title: Congressman Torres Tells SEC Chairman to End Crypto ‘Crusade’ After Ripple Ruling
description: The politician says it's time for the SEC to get comfortable with the “Torres Doctrine.”

title: Binance Integrates Lightning Network Deposits and Withdrawals
description: Binance, the largest cryptocurrency exchange by volume traded, has announced it has completed the integration of the Lightning Network, a BTC scaling layer, on its platform. Now users can execute bitcoin deposits and withdrawals using the network, taking advantage of lower fees. Binance Completes Integration of Lightning Network Binance recently announced the completion of its […]
